title: President Donald J. Trump Signs H.R. 3210 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		National Security & Defense	

Issued on:
May 22, 2018
On Tuesday, May 22, 2018, the President signed into law:H.R. 3210, the “Securely Expediting Clearances Through Reporting Transparency (SECRET) Act of 2018,” which requires reports on security clearance background investigations.
